levels.description:
Become immune to <$ba.debuff>Negative Statuses</>, Max HP <@ba.vup>+{max_hp:0%}</>, and attacks deal <@ba.vup>{lessng_s3[atk_scale].atk_scale:0%}</> ATK as Physical damage when attacking a blocked target
<@ba.rem>Skill can be used when Operator is affected by a Negative Status, removing the status, but dealing 600 Arts damage to self</>
